description: Number of partitions of a set of n elements where the partitions are of size >3.
references: E. A. Enneking and J. C. Ahuja, Generalized Bell numbers, Fib. Quart.,14(1976), 67-73.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
I. Mezo, Periodicity of the last digits of some combinatorial sequences, arXiv preprint arXiv:1308.1637, 2013
author: Steven C. Fairgrieve (fsteven(AT)math.wvu.edu), Nov 06 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Christian G. Bower_ and _James A. Sellers_, Nov 09 2000
